about.title: >About Me
about.over11: I am a versatile software developer. I work with multiple programming languages such as java, c, c++, python and php.
about.over12: currently, I focus on web-development, mostly on back-end using Laravel.
about.over13: additionally, I have the skills to work as a full-stack developer.
about.over22: bachelor’s degree in digital information processing
about.over25: pursuing bachelor’s degree in applied computer science
about.over41: experienced in working with linux and macos (terminals).
about.over42: experienced in working with github, figma, jetbrains suite, affinity photo 2, blender, vsc, vs, docker
about.over61: I love working out, playing tennis, playing video games, 3d modeling(photogrammetry) and photography.
about.over62: I also love new technologies and everything about it. I try my best to stay on top of news regarding the newest tech.
about.over63: Oh, and also I love working with carbon fiber. It's my favorite composite

project1.over21: Matematyczna Linia is my most ambitious project yet. It is a comprehensive web platform designed for managing tutoring sessions and educational materials in mathematics.
project1.over22: This project started as a bachelor’s thesis and is now being developed as a fully-fledged business platform, providing users with a modern tool for learning and organizing lessons.
project1.over23: The website is available in polish and english.
project1.over31: The platform offers advanced features such as:
project1.over34: adding and assigning tasks to students
project1.over37: browsing educational resources by advanced filters
project1.over41: Matematyczna Linia is already operating as an independent service and is evolving with new features in mind, such as:
project1.over46: This project demonstrates my skills in the full cycle of web application development - from concept to deployment.

project2.over21: A Flask-based web application showcasing selected, interesting data and statistics from GitHub in an accessible and engaging way.
project2.over31: web application offers features such as:
project2.over32: GitHub repo statistics in an accessible format
project2.over36: star growth, issues, and forks analysis
project2.over37: top repos by stars and forks
project2.over41: the project is considered to be finished and there are no plans to further expand this project.

project3.over21: the bug tracker application is a web-based tool designed to help teams manage and track bugs and errors efficiently. It provides a simple, minimalistic interface focused on usability and user experience.
project3.over32: Admin management: manage bug reports (add, edit, delete)
project3.over34: status tracking: assign statuses (fixed, wip, in queue, not fixed)
project3.over36: pagination and filtering: 10 per page, filter by category/status

project4.over21: this was my very first personal portfolio website showcasing skills, experiences, and projects.
project4.over22: the site was designed to provide a comprehensive overview of my background, including my professional experience, skills, education, and interests. it focused mostly on my web-dev/art experience and art work.
project4.over23: the website is only available in polish.
project4.over24: content on this website has not been updated in 3 years.
project4.over31: web application offers features such as:
project4.over32: responsive design: fully optimized for all devices
project4.over33: minimalistic style: clean and simple design reflecting personal style
project4.over34: modals: used for displaying larger images or additional information.
project4.over41: this project has been retired as new portfolio website has been created.

project5.over21: this section showcases several images of my 3d models / art projects i have created in blender or in fusion 360 over the years.

project6.over21: this section showcases several images that I took and that are in some way important to me or have high artistic value.
